sentences.en: A major addition to the earlier revisions of the questionnaire is the job requirement exercise.
sentences.cn: 之前对问卷的修改主要是增加了一些和工作要求有关的问题。

sentences.en: Graham Fletcher was unimpressed with the idea of filling in a lengthy questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 格雷厄姆·弗莱彻对填写冗长的调查问卷这种事没什么兴趣。

sentences.en: I designed a questionnaire to find out why It'should be so.
sentences.cn: 我设计了一份调查问卷,找出为什么会如此.

sentences.en: It included questionnaire design explanation, collection, reorganization and findings statistical analysis.
sentences.cn: 问卷设计说明 、 收集 、 整理和研究结果的统计分析.

sentences.en: Method: To investigate 139 senile resident patients by questionnaire and evaluation forms.
sentences.cn: 方法: 以评定量表和问卷的形式调查了139例老年住院患者.

sentences.en: Objective To make a willpower questionnaire for middle - high school students.
sentences.cn: 目的编制适合中学生使用的意志力问卷.

sentences.en: Peress had received a routine promotion even after he refused to answer a loyalty questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 佩雷斯尽管拒绝回答一次有关忠诚问题的质问,还是得到了按规定的晋级.

sentences.en: Teachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 教师们将被要求填写一份调查问卷。

sentences.en: The methods of researching article are literature and questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 论文的研究方法主要有文献法、问卷调查法.

sentences.en: The research methods include questionnaire survey and statistical analysis.
sentences.cn: 研究方法包括调查问卷和统计学分析.

sentences.en: To obtain the factual details, the adviser will complete a confidential questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 为了得到真实的细节, 顾问将填写一份机密调查表.

sentences.en: Use a questionnaire to survey [ find out about ] attitudes to smoking.
sentences.cn: 使用 问卷 方式调查对吸烟的意见.

sentences.en: We ask candidates to complete a psychometric questionnaire.
sentences.cn: 我们让候选人填写一份心理测试问卷。

sentences.en: When you have filled in the questionnaire, copy it and send the original to your employer.
sentences.cn: 填好这份问卷后，复印一份并将原卷交给雇主。

trans.tran_en: a written set of questions which you give to a large number of people in order to collect information
